titleStmt.title: The lamentacion that Ladie Iane made saiyng for my fathers proclamacion now must I lese my heade.

notesStmt.note: Printer's name and suggested publication date from STC.
Erroneously identified on UMI microfilm reel as being held in the British Library.
Reproduction of the original in Longleat, Warminster, Wilts. (Marquess of Bath).
